title: Taking a Walk in a Dream
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Shiitake-chan is so fluffy~, so relaxing~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Isn’t she~? I also love spending time petting this fluffiness♪ Even when I’m depressed, having Shiitake around me is really calming~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Maaan~, it’s hard to get away from this fluff.... Kanata wonders if we’ll get good dreams if we use Shiitake-chan as a body pillow....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeh, a body pillow?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah. It would be fun if you can sleep and take her on a walk in the dream~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That does seem fun, but.... you don’t really need to be in a dream to do that, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Don’t think too much about it~. But you’re right, walking Shiitake-chan sounds like fun~. Kanata wants to try walking along the coast with her.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Then let’s just go now! You see, even if she looks like this, Shiitake actually pulls you all over the place on walks. It’s a pretty good exercise~.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eh, is it really that demanding? Can Kanata even keep up.... Maybe it’s better to just stay home and sleep with her....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It’s fine, it’s fine! I’m sure you’ll have a good dream if you take a nap after all that walk! With that decided, let’s head out!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
